channel.title: Makeing npc fight eachother and never die [pi]

1: it’s always PI.
2: that’s not adequate information.
3: I’m not writing it for you.

item.title: Makeing npc fight eachother and never die [pi]
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Mirrors RSPS Mirrors
item.description:
@RSPS_Mirrors wrote:

Well you’d make it check to see if the npc’s hp is 0 and then set it to full hp again. i.e.:

if (n.getHitpoints() < 1) {
        n.setHitpoints(n.gethitpointsLevel);
}

You’d probably add that in the NPCDeathTask or whatever. Obviously that is just concept as you provided no information for anyone to work with. You’ll also obviously need to have a NPC vs NPC system if you don’t have already (is your combat entity based).

Read full topic
item.source: Makeing npc fight eachother and never die [pi]
